div.span: elcome to the Putnam County Charter School System,

span.font: WHERE TALENTS ARE DISCOVERED AND MEMORIES ARE MADE!

font.i: then you're in the right place!

font.span: Our mission is to assist all students in acquiring knowledge, fostering aspirations, and developing life skills that will empower them to become self-directing, productive and contributing members of a global society. Our vision is a school system in which students, staff and community learn, grow and work together to embrace the future.
